description:
Enterprise Video Conferencing Solutions

Kingsoft Meeting is a convenient, economical, and secure enterprise video conferencing solution. It can connect with the Kingsoft Office product ecosystem and provide a smooth meeting collaboration experience. Users can join meetings with one click, share documents, manage schedules, switch devices, lock meetings, and more. Kingsoft Meeting supports multi-device meetings, including phones, tablets, computers, TVs, etc., covering more than 200 countries and regions around the world. It supports 1080P HD video and audio smooth transmission, ensuring the quality of communication. Kingsoft Meeting also uses audio and video transmission encryption technology to ensure the security and reliability of meetings.
